PRODID:-//Lotties Period//Calendar 1.0//EN
VERSION:2.0
CALSCALE:GREGORIAN
METHOD:PUBLISH
X-WR-CALNAME:Lotties Period
X-WR-TIMEZONE:Europe/Amsterdam

DTSTAMP:20251126T010000Z

DTEND;VALUE=DATE:20251108
SUMMARY:Period
DESCRIPTION:Your period is expected during this time.
END:VEVENT

header.description: Added as a part of security scheme: bearer

query.description: Maximum number of cycles to return

item.name: Start a new Cycle (Log Start of Menstruation)

request.description:
Triggers the start of a new Cycle.

Logic: 
1. This sets the Cycle Start Date.
2. By definition, this is also the Menstruation (bleeding) Start Date.
3. If a previous cycle is `ACTIVE`, it is automatically `CLOSED` with an end date of (`newStartDate` - 1 day).

response.name: Cycle started successfully

header.description: Added as a part of security scheme: bearer

response.body:
{
